attributes.action: Use the profits from it’s stake in the Royal Bank Of Scotland and reinvest them in the Corus plant on Teesside to save the 1600 jobs at risk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government can all but, nationalise the banking industry in this country with tax payer’s money to save bankers, then the same should be afforded to our steel industry.
